remarks: Equality with a projection.  This version of ~ pjeq does not assume the Axiom of Choice via ~ pjhth .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 15-May-2014.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
pjpreeq $p |- ( ( H e. CH /\ A e. ( H +H ( _|_ ` H ) ) ) -> ( ( ( projh ` H ) ` A ) = B <-> ( B e. H /\ E. x e. ( _|_ ` H ) A = ( B +h x ) ) ) ) $.
$d A x $.
$d B x $.
$d H x $.
